NOT_EMPTY_MSG_001: ̄It seems your Monster Storage is full. Please release a monster to make room.
NOT_EMPTY_MSG_002:
̂It seems you don't have any monsters that possess this kind of riding ability.
ā
Allow us to provide you with one that has it.
DEMO_019_AFT_TLG_001: ̂Ahead lies the C-Rank License Exam. Will you be participating?Ă
DEMO_019_AFT_TLG_002:
̂Before we begin, allow me to explain the rules for the
License Exam, Master ȁ.
ā
Each exam is made up of three different battles. If you're able to win 
each round, you'll have successfully completed the exam.
ā
For the exam, you may only use Active Monsters to fight. 
Standby Monsters will not be allowed to assist you.
ā
DEMO_019_AFT_TLG_002_2:
̂You will also be forbidden from using items or giving orders to your monsters. Choosing to flee will result in immediate failure.
ā
Those are all of the rules for the exams... I wish you luck and for your success, Master ȁ.
DEMO_019_AFT_TLG_WARNING_001:
̂... Sorry, but you may not participate in the License Exam at this time.
ā
For the sake of our Master's safety, we require you to have two or more monsters on your team.
ā
Please return and take the exam when you have two or more monsters on your team.
REC_POINT_06_02: ̄Where the License Exam is given. Leads to the Virtual Colosseum Ring.
DEMO_019_AFT_TLG_003: ̂Understood. Please return when you have properly prepared for the exam.
DEMO_019_AFT_TLG_004: ̂You have returned for the C-Rank Exam? Are you ready to take it?Ă
DEMO_019_AFT_TLG_005: ̂Re-administering the C-Rank Exam. Perhaps this time you will pass...
DEMO_019_AFT_TLG_006: ̂Understood. When you are prepared, return for the exam.
DEMO_019_AFT_TLG_009:
̂You are currently issued a C-Rank License.
ā
The next challenge would be B-Rank. Please locate the corresponding entrance for that exam.
RIDE_TUT_EVENT_001:
̂I will now start the tutorial for Land Ride and　 Battle 
ā
At this time the monolith at the exit is locked and the key is held by the monster in this room.
ā
To get to the monster up there, you have to ride one of your monsters.
ā
First, press X and go to the menu page. Select Ride Moster.
ā
Use the D-Pad on the left of the screen to choose your partner.
RIDE_TUT_EVENT_001_01: ̂To ride the monster, you can use your own or ride this monster here.
RIDE_TUT_EVENT_001_03:
̂When you ride a monster, you're able to jump higher than usual.
ā
Go up to the monster by jumping up on the steps.
RIDE_TUT_EVENT_002_02:
̂
 The key to the monolith is held by the monster in this room.
ā
Choose your partner after selecting Ride Monster from the menu page.
ā
When you ride a monster, you're able to jump higher than usual. 
Go up to the monster by jumping up on the steps.
RIDE_TUT_EVENT_002_01:
̂At this time the monolith at the exit is locked and the key is held by the monster in this room.
ā
To get to the monster up there, you have to ride one of your monsters.
ā
First, press X and go to the menu page. Select Ride Moster.
ā
Use the D-Pad on the left of the screen to choose your partner.
RIDE_TUT_EVENT_003_02:
̂It appears as though you've found the Monolith Key. 
Now, it's time to re-activate the Monolith and leave this place.
RIDE_TUT_EVENT_004:
̂Congratulations, ȁ. You were able to unlock the monolith.
ā
Land Ride and Battle Ride should help you with your upcoming battles. Please use them. 
ā
This concludes the tutorial. Great work.
RIDE_TUT_EVENT_005:
̂Congratulations Master ȁ. The Monolith has unlocked, and a new exit has appeared.
ā
Underwater Riding will surely prove to be an invaluable ability during your travels. Use it to your advantage.
ā
That concludes the Underwater Ride Tutorial... it's time for you to return to your world.
RIDE_TUT_EVENT_006:
̂Congratulations, Master ȁ. You've unlocked the Monolith and can now freely travel back to your world.
ā
I'm sure you will find Aerial Ride to be an invaluable ability on your travels. Use it wisely.
ā
That concludes the Aerial Ride Tutorial... it's time for you to return to your world.
RIDE_TUT_EVENT_202_01:
̂The monolith at the exit is locked and the key is up there.
ā
Under menu, select Ride Monster and choose a monster midsized and below.
ā
Ride your monster to jump up the steps and get the key.

̂I will now begin the tutorial for Underwater Ride.
ā
At this time, the monolith at the exit is locked and the key is on the bottom of this pool.

ā
Select Ride Monster under menu, and choose your monster, midsized or below.
RIDE_TUT_EVENT_101_01: ̂You can use your own or use our monster here.

ā
Ride a monster that is midsized or below and press B on water. You should be able to dive in.
